turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Hi there, may I please speak with Jordan Lee?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: My name's Sam, I'm calling from Example Finance. I'm not able to discuss any details unless I'm speaking directly with Jordan. Are you Jordan?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: No, I'm not. Jordan doesn't live here anymore. Hasn't for ages. Stop calling this number.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I apologise for that. I completely understand. I won't discuss anything further with you. Can I just confirm—are you requesting that this number be removed from our contact records?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Yes! Remove it. This is the third time you've called. It's really annoying.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I hear you and I'm sorry about that. I'll mark this as a 'wrong party' situation and have the number removed. Can I just confirm the number I've reached you on—does it end in 2207?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Yes, 2207. And please don't call again.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I've noted that down. Again, I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. The number ending 2207 has been flagged for removal and you shouldn't receive any further calls from us. Have a good day.
